survey_name: Electric Bike Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user experiences, satisfaction levels, and preferences regarding electric bikes (e-bikes) for urban commuting and leisure.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bike (e-bike)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover the full range of usage frequencies.
